programme.title: Rumahku Istanaku Ep1
programme.desc: Program realiti pertama di Indonesia yang berani menghadiahkan 1 unit rumah dan wang tunai untuk setiap episod.

programme.title: Harta, Tahta, Cinta Ep1
programme.desc: Untuk memastikan rancangannya berjalan lancar, Chandra mendekati ramai janda kaya untuk menggunakan kekayaan mereka. Itulah yang dirasakan oleh Tiwi. Chandra sanggup menikahi Tiwi untuk kali kedua demi harta Tiwi. Chandra juga bekerjasama dengan kekasihnya untuk merampas kekayaan Tiwi.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep111
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Woman Soto Didadaku Woman Soto Kebanggaanku
programme.desc: Naya, seorang pembuat sup, ditawarkan untuk menjadi hos bersama acara dan imbuhannya ialah menonton bola sepak Pasukan Kebangsaan dalam kelas VIP. Itu sudah menjadi impian Naya. Namun, harapannya gagal.

programme.title: Festival Ramadan 2022 Ep10
programme.desc: Keseronokan pencarian bakat memberi warna pada bulan yang penuh barakah ini! Kami bawakan kepada anda Qasidah, Marawis, dan pelbagai keunikan dan hiburan.

programme.title: Barakallah Ep27
programme.desc: Barakallah merupakan program tausiah yang dibimbing oleh Abdel Achrian bersama Ustaz Solmed dan Ustaz Taufiqurrahman yang akan memfokuskan kepada membincangkan permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat hingga kepada masalah kehidupan rumah tangga

programme.title: Rumahku Istanaku Ep2
programme.desc: Program realiti pertama di Indonesia yang berani menghadiahkan 1 unit rumah dan wang tunai untuk setiap episod.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A once legendary gangster Dong-chul tries to settle down to enjoy an ordinary life with his wife, but things get hard when he continuously gets tricked into making bad business decisions.

programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: 4 years after the events of Garibong district round up operation, Geumcheon Police’s Major Crimes Unit is given a mission to repatriate a fugitive who fled to Vietnam.

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: The Missing Vip
programme.desc: After discovering he can suddenly talk to animals, an intelligence agent partners with a canine pal to take care of a case gone sideways.

programme.title: Wonderful Ghost
programme.desc: A patrol officer’s soul gets separated from his body while he was investigating a case. Unexpectedly he discovers his neighbor who runs a judo studio is the only person can see him.

programme.title: Be With You
programme.desc: Before her death, a woman promises her family that she would return on a rainy day, one year later. Miraculously, she reappears before her husband and son but has no memory about her past.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: A man who became a suspect in a closed-door murder seeks help from an attorney to prove him innocent. As they begin to piece the puzzle together, the truth slowly reverses.

programme.title: Master
programme.desc: An intellectual crime investigation team goes after One Network, a company involved in a massive fraud and corruption case in Korea.

programme.title: I Am Father
programme.desc: A magician was framed for murder by a corrupt detective. When his deceased wife's heart was found suitable for the detective's daughter transplantation, he decided to take revenge.

programme.title: Perfect Proposal
programme.desc: A young woman conspires with a casino employee to swindle a businessman out of his fortune.

programme.title: Insane
programme.desc: Soo-A gets locked up at a psychiatric hospital against her will. One year later, a PD comes across her notebook with a detailed account of the cruelty she faced. He seeks her out to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Da Capo
programme.desc: A frustrated songwriter met his old bandmate and a school band "Destroyer", who inspired him to complete an unfinished track...

programme.title: Honest Candidate 2
programme.desc: Joo Sang-sook, who failed to win the Seoul mayoral election by dropping the truth bomb on national television, is suddenly pulled into the spotlight again after rescuing a young man from drowning.

programme.title: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: "Operation Chromite" tells the true story of a General, who led the attack against the North Koreans in the Battle of Incheon, forcing them to retreat out of Seoul.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: An unusual family is born as two ruthless loan sharks take in a little girl as collateral for unpaid debts.

programme.title: Steel Rain: Summit
programme.desc: A peace summit for Korea is derailed when the leaders of South Korea, North Korea and the U.S. are abducted by North Korean hardliners and held hostage in a submarine.

programme.title: Secretly, Greatly
programme.desc: 3 North Korean spies who have been living and bonding in South Korea's community for years got the order to take their own life after a sudden power change in their government. What would they choose?

programme.title: The Thieves
programme.desc: Korean and Hong Kong thieves team up to heist a $20M worth diamond, while everyone has their own agenda to keep the diamond for themselves.

programme.title: Rolling
programme.desc: Juri with depression is stuck at home during COVID. As her mother went visit Juri's grandmother, Juri has to run their Kimbap restaurant until her mother returns.

programme.title: Confession Of Murder
programme.desc: A police officer haunted for failing to capture a serial killer 15 years back, returns to the case after a novelist publishes the book "I am the Murderer", claiming responsibility for the crimes.

programme.title: Soar Into The Sun
programme.desc: An elite combat pilot carries a rescue mission to his missing teammate while facing threats from the north.

programme.title: The Fatal Encounter
programme.desc: King Jeongjo is under threat by the opposing Nowon and Soron factions and struggles to protect his throne. He faces opposition from every direction and becomes the target of assassination.

programme.title: Me And Me
programme.desc: When a detective heads to a rural village to investigate the mysterious death of a couple, he finds himself in an inexplicable situation where his life is completely reversed.

programme.title: Beautiful Vampire
programme.desc: A beautiful 500-year-old vampire has her carefully constructed quiet life put in jeopardy when she becomes attracted to her landlady's doltish son.

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: The Missing Vip
programme.desc: After discovering he can suddenly talk to animals, an intelligence agent partners with a canine pal to take care of a case gone sideways.

programme.title: How To Steal A Dog
programme.desc: As the family goes bankrupt, Jiso decided to steal dog from wealthy family and return it for the reward money. Will her plan be successful?

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: Elite attorney Kang Seong-Hee goes up against a top prosecutor over a case involving a man accused of killing his wife.

programme.title: A Day
programme.desc: A man commits an unethical act in an attempt to save his daughter's life. Three years later, his actions return to haunt him.

programme.title: Rolling
programme.desc: Juri with depression is stuck at home during COVID. As her mother went visit Juri's grandmother, Juri has to run their Kimbap restaurant until her mother returns.

programme.title: Master
programme.desc: An intellectual crime investigation team goes after One Network, a company involved in a massive fraud and corruption case in Korea.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A once legendary gangster Dong-chul tries to settle down to enjoy an ordinary life with his wife, but things get hard when he continuously gets tricked into making bad business decisions.

programme.title: Exit

programme.desc: Traces the current affairs from china and the world

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10091010
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45814582
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2015

programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep439
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Let’s Go Crazy on Live!(M) Ep2021
programme.desc: As an ordinary girl, working an ordinary job, at an ordinary convenience store, Lin An An had only one dream in life: to find a good, stable, government job so she could support her aging grandfather. With that single dream in mind, An An never even thought of becoming anything more than the ordinary girl she had always been. But all that changed the day You Yuan Le walked into her life.

programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep193194
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep47
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep965
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep1036
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep817818
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep663
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep440
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep2021
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each other’s back.

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Set in 1917, young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong. The school is held hostage on the day of an English speech competition, and as Ip Man decides to step up and fight the crisis, it is revealed that his master and his childhood friend are behind all this. Can he take them down and uphold justice?

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then…

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say “yes”?

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the “Gang of Five” in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Days of Being Wild
programme.desc: Yuddy is an orphan who is callous towards any women who falls for him. One day, Yuddy sets out on a fateful journey to Philippines to meet with his mother, but the trip ended up disheartening him again.

programme.title: Zhongkui Kill Demon Legend
programme.desc: The Heavenly Master trapped the spirit of the Demon King so as to save the world from evil. Before he dies, the trapped spirit is transferred into Zhong Kui. As a half human and half demon, Zhong Kui is torn between good and evil. Which side will he finally choose?

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Long’s daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity…

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score…

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: The Cheng family embodies a microcosm of Hong Kong, with its contradictions between tradition and modernity, superstition and materialism, family and individual. The movie reveals troubled characters dealing with their own issues in the city, from the eldest, Taoist priest patriarch Dong; to the youngest, the bullied elementary schooler Chloe.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the other’s mole.

programme.title: Princess & 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven Kung Fu masters live in Lucky Town, the only safe residing place in northeast China. When warlord Lam refuses to side with the Japanese, an agent is assigned to take over his army and kill his daughter using ninjutsu. Lam’s daughter escapes and seeks help from the seven masters, who finally defeat the enemy and save the warlord!

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: In this movie directed by John Woo, lawyer Du goes on the run after he is framed for a murder. Veteran detective Yamura suspects the case to be more complicated than it seems, and while he understands Du better during the hunt, Yamura still doubts his innocence. Is the real killer lurking elsewhere? Is there a hidden conspiracy behind the murder?

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: The Empty Hands
programme.desc: Mari Hirakawa inherits her father’s dojo after his death but wants to sell it as she does not want to run the karate practice. For her plan to succeed, she has to take on a bet with his father’s ex-student and compete in a martial arts competition that will change her life.

programme.title: The Trough
programme.desc: Yu Chau is a cop who has gone very deeply undercover within the triads. When he accidentally kills one of his pals in an operation, he runs off into the wild to lick his wounds. Upon his return, he teams up with fellow officers Jim and Jackie to catch a triad Boss, only to unveil collusion with government officials at the highest level.

programme.title: Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: Island East Police Station headed by Madam Lui is known for its “Cop Shop Babes” as all the officers there are female. Two police officers, Beer and Satay, apply for an internal transfer to this station in order to approach the girls. It is at this time that the police receives a bomb threat – can they resolve the case?

programme.title: A Chinese Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Young demon hunter Yan loves the fox spirit Xiao Qian but has to rid her memories of him as a human cannot love a demon. Years later, Ning meets Xiao Qian and they fall in love. Yan advises Ning to give Xiao Qian up as she is now controlled by an evil Tree Demon but he refuses. As the Tree Demon seeks revenge, Xiao Qian also starts to remember Yan.

programme.title: Hello Babies
programme.desc: Lui Ming and Yeung Wai are constantly fighting with each other on everything, and now they are competing to be the first to get a grandson. Lui hires the Super Star midwife Gong San to “supervise” their sons and nephews to make it happen…

programme.title: The Foreigner
programme.desc: A London businessman whose teenage daughter dies in a terrorist attack is determined to take revenge. His relentless search for the terrorists leads to a conflict with a British government official whose own past may hold the clues to identify the elusive killers.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the minister’s conspiracy…

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When massive layoffs are expected, four middle-aged men pledge their loyalty to the company by joining the newly formed dragon boat team. As the four embark on their rigorous training, they are forced to face their respective mid-life issues. The process rekindles their long-lost fighting spirit, and they begin to welcome life’s challenges.

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung is a fearless fighter who aligns himself with one of the two gang leaders ruling Guangzhou. However, there is more to the young Wong Fei Hung than meets the eye as he has a more dangerous agenda in mind.

programme.title: Kill Mobile
programme.desc: Seven friends get together and decide to play a game where they must share all the messages, calls and app notifications on each other's cell phones. Hilarity and drama follows as everyone's secrets are unveiled throughout the evening, and the seven friends find themselves more like strangers to each other than ever before!

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Police’s Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yen’s property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love…

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband’s playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: The Lady Hermit hides away for years to plot revenge after being defeated by the evil Black Knight. Young swordswoman Tsui Ping is determined to take down Black Knight herself and begs Lady Hermit to teach her martial arts skills. The Black Knight's days are numbered when the Lady Hermit and her protege perfect the technique to take him down.

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The Kung-Fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wong’s caught in the Mong’s territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Ping’s limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: The Story Of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: The bandits of Hulu Valley slay the chief of the Mei Clan while searching for a treasure map. In retaliation, Chun from the Mei Clan infiltrates the bandit's fortress to map a way in for the authorities, but ends up falling in love with the bandit leader's daughter, Pearl. While Chun’s plot is uncovered, he receives unexpected help from Pearl.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his family’s declining status. Lin visits his fiancée before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lin’s bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: Legend Of The Bat
programme.desc: It is rumoured that people can buy anything they desire on the mysterious Island of Bats so long as they have money. The charismatic swordsman Chu Liu Xiang and his friend travel to the island to seek answers but realize they are not the only ones who want to unveil the mystery of this place.

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich man’s party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chief’s granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlord’s home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists’ cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang’s. On the Chang’s farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Heroes of the East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people’s livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hong’s enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fiancé, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
programme.desc: Gordon Liu plays an anti-Manchu rebel who escapes to the Shaolin Temple and learns what it truly takes to become a martial arts master by challenging the 35 Shaolin Kung Fu chambers, eventually creating the 36th chamber himself.

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiancée Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Lin and his two friends are traveling patriots who vow to stand up against violence and fight for justice. They meet a rich young man Chu by chance one day and the four become best friends. When a foreign prince plots to possess Chu’s family fortune and goes after him, Lin and friends go all out to help Chu fight against the villain.

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sing’s wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master named “Shadow Whip”, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to “Shadow Whip”?

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in the fight between the Qing and Ming camps and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. Another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Lin finally battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three men who are close as brothers is put through the ultimate test when one of them gives in to corruption and pursues his love for his friend's wife.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fiancé Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan…

programme.title: The Thunderbolt Fist
programme.desc: A vicious Japanese judo expert wants to prove that Chinese are the “sick people of Asia” and sets out to sabotage and kill the best martial artists in dangerous tournaments. To save his son from this, the head of Ping Pai Boxing Institute sends him to the mountains to learn the powerful Thunderbolt Fist technique from master fighter, Red Butterfly.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeeper’s daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she’s soon framed for her husband’s murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense…

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: Hagola Ep4

programme.title: Hagola Ep5
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep3
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep4
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep6

programme.desc: A young boy witnesses his father's murder and vows to avenge his death. Years later, he arrives in Bangkok to find his father's killers but, in the meantime, falls in love.

programme.title: College Kumar
programme.desc: Kumar's father, an ordinary man, does everything in his power to give him a good future. However, when Kumar starts feeling the pressure, he starts rebelling.

programme.title: D Block
programme.desc: When the female students of an engineering college mysteriously disappear and are found dead, a young man and his friends decide to look for the culprit.

programme.title: Maara
programme.desc: A young woman named Paaru notices a painting on the walls of a coastal town that depicts a fairy tale she once heard as a child. Intrigued, she sets out to find the person who painted it.

programme.title: Raj Bahaddur
programme.desc: A man, who belongs to the royal Bahaddur family, falls for a simple girl. However, he faces trouble while trying to win her over because the latter's father gets her engaged to someone else.

programme.title: College Kumar
programme.desc: Kumar's father, an ordinary man, does everything in his power to give him a good future. However, when Kumar starts feeling the pressure, he starts rebelling.

programme.title: Maara
programme.desc: A young woman named Paaru notices a painting on the walls of a coastal town that depicts a fairy tale she once heard as a child. Intrigued, she sets out to find the person who painted it.

programme.title: Raj Bahaddur
programme.desc: A man, who belongs to the royal Bahaddur family, falls for a simple girl. However, he faces trouble while trying to win her over because the latter's father gets her engaged to someone else.

programme.title: Local Boys
programme.desc: Two student gangs representing rival schools constantly get into fights with each other. However, a professor tries to break up their rivalry and get them on the right path.

programme.title: I Love India
programme.desc: Diwakar is determined in his battle against terrorism and is after a gang that supplies arms to terrorists. Although they brutally kill his sister, he continues in his effort to find them.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: A guilt-ridden police officer finds solace in liquor after he loses his squad during a mission. Soon, his new partner convinces him to reopen a case while harbouring a secret agenda of his own.

programme.title: Athidhi
programme.desc: Amrita's parents are killed by a troubled teenager and her adopted brother, Athidhi, is framed for the crime and arrested. Fourteen years later, Athidhi tries to hunt down the real killer.

programme.title: Aranmanai Kili
programme.desc: Raasaiyya, who works as a house help for a wealthy family, is unaware of Poongodi's feelings for him. Things take a turn when he saves Chellamma after she is abducted and dragged into the flesh trade.

programme.title: Athiratha
programme.desc: Following the family legacy, an engineering graduate takes up the job of a TV journalist. One day, he is arrested in connection to a banking scandal and must prove his innocence.

programme.title: Waqt Ki Awaz
programme.desc: A young assistant director meets a woman working in his friend's office. He narrates his incomplete love story to her only to find out that she is his lover's cousin.

programme.title: Prince
programme.desc: A thief plans the robbery of a lifetime. However, he wakes up one morning to realise that he has lost his memory and his life is at stake.

programme.title: Janwar The Wild Man
programme.desc: Movie starring Karikalan, Priti Arora and Pandiyarajan and is directed by Karikalan.

programme.title: Tevar
programme.desc: A kabaddi player tries to safeguard a young woman hounded by a deadly factional leader who wants to marry her against her wish. Eventually, they both fall in love with each other.

programme.title: Abhimanyu
programme.desc: Abhimanyu, a professional computer engineer, puts his life at risk and fights for people from poverty-stricken areas so that they receive an education.

programme.title: Beta
programme.desc: Raju, a young man, is devoted to his stepmother as he only wishes to be showered with motherly love. However, his stepmother exploits his love to extort his wealth.

programme.title: Beta
programme.desc: Raju, a young man, is devoted to his stepmother as he only wishes to be showered with motherly love. However, his stepmother exploits his love to extort his wealth.

programme.title: Veeram The Power Man
programme.desc: Vinayagam lives with his four brothers and they often get into trouble with the law. When he falls in love with a girl named Koppu, he decides to mend his ways for her.

programme.title: Saajan Ki Saheli
programme.desc: Kunti abandons her baby in order to lead a lavish life and marries a rich man. Years later, she realises that her husband is indulging in an affair and is shocked to find out the truth about the girl.

programme.title: Raja Hindustani
programme.desc: Raja, a taxi driver, falls in love with Aarti, a rich girl, and marries her against her parents' wishes. Later, her stepmother tries to create differences amongst the couple.

programme.title: Stalin
programme.desc: Stalin is deeply moved by the suicide of a girl with physical disabilities. As a result, he devises a formula of extending unconditional help to those who need it to establish peace.

programme.title: Warning
programme.desc: A group of friends go for a yacht ride to celebrate their friend's birthday. However, their party turns into a misadventure when they decide to go swimming and they encounter a dangerous predator.

programme.title: Ek Aur Bol Bachchan
programme.desc: Rehman and his sister move to Bheemarajapuram, where a local landlord employs him at his house. He introduces himself as Ram but later has to face severe trouble to keep up this lie.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars

programme.title: We'Re The Millers
programme.desc: Jason Sudeikis stars in this buzz-worthy comedy as a small-time suburban pot-dealer who likes to keep a low profile. When he's jumped by some gutter punks who steal his cash and his stash, he finds himself in deep trouble with his supplier, Brad (Ed Helms). In order to make amends, the small-time peddler must become a big-time drug smuggler by bringing Brad's latest shipment in from Mexico. Enlisting his neighbors – a cynical stripper (Jennifer Aniston), a streetwise teen (Emma Roberts) and a wannabe customer (Will Poulter) – he comes up with a foolproof plan. One fake wife, two pretend kids and a ginormous shiny RV later, "the Millers" are headed south of the border for a Fourth of July weekend that's sure to end with a bang or two!

Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to find and recruit a team of metahumans to stand against this newly awakened threat. But despite the formation of this unprecedented league of heroes – Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash – it may already be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep1
programme.desc: 30 Rock - Pilot - Head writer Liz Lemon finds herself defending her live TV show when brash new network executive Jack Donaghy (Alec Baldwin) starts meddling.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep2
programme.desc: The Aftermath - One erratic star (Tracy Morgan), one neurotic star (Jane Krakowski), and a meddlesome boss (Alec Baldwin) create panic in the writers room.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep3
programme.desc: Blind Date - Jack plays matchmaker, setting Liz up on a blind date.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep4
programme.desc: Jack The Writer - Liz keeps aspiring writer Jack from taking over the writers room and Kenneth the Page tries desperately to impress Tracy.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep5
programme.desc: Jack-Tor - Jack (Alec Baldwin) aspires to act and Tracy (Tracy Morgan) reveals a painful secret.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep6
programme.desc: Jack Meets Dennis - Liz Lemon goes back to her ex-boyfriend Dennis, (guest star Dean Winters) simply because she's bored.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep7
programme.desc: Tracy Does Conan - Two stars arguing over a coveted appearance on "Late Night with Conan O'Brien" (guest star Conan O'Brien) push Liz Lemon to the edge.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep8
programme.desc: The Break-Up - Liz finally calls it quits with Dennis (guest star Dean Winters) while personal politics pit Toofer against Tracy.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep9
programme.desc: The Baby Show - Liz (Tina Fey) and Jack (Alec Baldwin) both battle maternal woes. Chris Parnell guest stars.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep10
programme.desc: The Rural Juror - Jenna awaits the opening of her long-anticipated movie while Tracy digs out of debt.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep11
programme.desc: The Head and The Hair - Liz falls for an attractive guy and Jack walks in Kenneth's shoes.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep12
programme.desc: Black Tie - Tracy tempts Pete while Liz gets a glimpse into Jack's past.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep13
programme.desc: Up All Night - Valentine's Day goes awry for TGS cast. After the entire cast binges on some questionable seafood at the craft services table, they hunker down to pull an all nighter -- on Valentine's Day -- and cobble a new show together.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep14
programme.desc: The "C" Word - Liz works overtime to prove to her writers that she's a good boss in "30 Rock".

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep15
programme.desc: Hard Ball - Jack negotiates Josh's contract while Kenneth the Page earns a spot in Tracy's entourage.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep16
programme.desc: The Source Awards - Jack forces Tracy to attend The Source Awards, while Kenneth the Page catches the eye of a hip-hop star's girlfriend -- with special guest stars LL Cool J, Wayne Brady and Ghostface Killah.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep17
programme.desc: The Fighting Irish - Jack welcomes his brother Eddie (Special Guest Star Nathan Lane) into the 'TGS' family.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep18
programme.desc: Fireworks - Jack (Alec Baldwin) turns to Kenneth (Jack McBrayer) for help when an aggressive West Coast NBC exec (Special Guest Star Will Arnett) declares he's after Donaghy's job.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep19
programme.desc: Corporate Crush - Liz finds love while Jack fights to keep his job.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep20
programme.desc: Cleveland - Liz (Tina Fey) mulls a Midwest move while Jack (Alec Baldwin) plans to wed.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep21
programme.desc: Hiatus - With the end of 'TGS' season near, Liz and the cast face decisions that rock the show in the season finale; Emmy Winners Sean Hayes, Elaine Stritch and Chris Parnell Guest Star.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep1
programme.desc: SeinfeldVision - The gang at "30 Rock" returns from their summer hiatus.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Jack Gets In The Game - On the heels of Jack (Alec Baldwin) realizing that GE head Don Geiss (Guest Star Rip Torn) may be retiring, Jack's nemesis, Devin, (Guest Star Will Arnett) returns engaged to Don's daughter.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Collection - In an effort to cut off any chance of GE digging up dirt against him, Jack (Alec Baldwin) hires his own private investigator, Len (Guest Star Steve Buscemi), to head them off.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Rosemary's Baby - When Liz (Tina Fey) meets her idol, Rosemary Howard (Guest Star Carrie Fisher), she invites her to be a guest writer on the show.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Greenzo - As part of a GE-wide green initiative, Jack (Alec Baldwin) has come up with the idea of creating a green mascot for NBC -- a Philly Fanatic-looking character named Greenzo.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Somebody To Love - Jack (Alec Baldwin) attends a cocktail party honoring Colin Powell, and there, he falls for C.C. (Guest Star Edie Falco), a Democratic congresswoman from Vermont.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Cougars - As part of his community service, Tracy (Tracy Morgan) takes on the duties of coaching an inner city little league team from Knuckle Beach, the worst neighborhood in New York.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Secrets And Lies - C.C. (Edie Falco) wants to go public over her love for Jack (Alec Baldwin), while Liz (Tina Fey) tries to appease both Tracy (Tracy Morgan) and Jenna (Jane Krakowski). With special guest stars Edie Falco and James Carville.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Ludachristmas - It's time again for the office's annual 'Ludachristmas' party and Liz and Jack's families come to visit. Special guests Elaine Stritch, Andy Richter, Buck Henry and Anita Gillette guest star.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Jack (Alec Baldwin) and C.C. (guest star Edie Falco) try to make their long distance love affair work. Liz (Tina Fey) invests in real estate for the first time and Kenneth (Jack McBrayer) gets hooked on caffeine. Special guests include Edie Falco and Gladys Knight.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Someone calls Jack Donaghy (Alec Baldwin) a "Class A Moron" and the New York Post's "Page Six" column picks it up causing Jack agitation. Guest star Rob Huebel.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Subway Hero - Liz's (Tina Fey) old boyfriend, Dennis Duffy (guest star Dean Winters) becomes New York's "Subway Hero" and Jack (Alec Baldwin) wants him booked on the show. Tim Conway guest stars.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Succession - Don Geiss (guest star Rip Torn) confides to Jack (Alec Baldwin) that he will be named the new GE chairman and Jack names a new successor to his position. Will Arnett and Chris Parnell also guest star.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Sandwich Day - Liz's (Tina Fey) ex-boyfriend Floyd (guest star Jason Sudeikis) returns to New York while Jack's (Alec Baldwin) days with GE may be numbered. It's Sandwich Day at "TGS" and the sandwich shop location is kept tightly guarded by the Teamsters. Rip Torn and Brian Dennehy also guest star.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Cooter - Jack heads to Washington, DC while Liz has a pregnancy scare, and Kenneth applies to be a page for the Summer Olympics. Tracy is in the final stages of his new invention. Matthew Broderick, Edie Falco, Dean Winters, and Paul Scheer guest star.

programme.desc: Corporate Crush - Liz finds love while Jack fights to keep his job.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep20
programme.desc: Cleveland - Liz (Tina Fey) mulls a Midwest move while Jack (Alec Baldwin) plans to wed.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep21
programme.desc: Hiatus - With the end of 'TGS' season near, Liz and the cast face decisions that rock the show in the season finale; Emmy Winners Sean Hayes, Elaine Stritch and Chris Parnell Guest Star.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep1
programme.desc: SeinfeldVision - The gang at "30 Rock" returns from their summer hiatus.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Jack Gets In The Game - On the heels of Jack (Alec Baldwin) realizing that GE head Don Geiss (Guest Star Rip Torn) may be retiring, Jack's nemesis, Devin, (Guest Star Will Arnett) returns engaged to Don's daughter.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Collection - In an effort to cut off any chance of GE digging up dirt against him, Jack (Alec Baldwin) hires his own private investigator, Len (Guest Star Steve Buscemi), to head them off.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Rosemary's Baby - When Liz (Tina Fey) meets her idol, Rosemary Howard (Guest Star Carrie Fisher), she invites her to be a guest writer on the show.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Greenzo - As part of a GE-wide green initiative, Jack (Alec Baldwin) has come up with the idea of creating a green mascot for NBC -- a Philly Fanatic-looking character named Greenzo.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Somebody To Love - Jack (Alec Baldwin) attends a cocktail party honoring Colin Powell, and there, he falls for C.C. (Guest Star Edie Falco), a Democratic congresswoman from Vermont.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Cougars - As part of his community service, Tracy (Tracy Morgan) takes on the duties of coaching an inner city little league team from Knuckle Beach, the worst neighborhood in New York.

programme.title: 30 Rock S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Secrets And Lies - C.C. (Edie Falco) wants to go public over her love for Jack (Alec Baldwin), while Liz (Tina Fey) tries to appease both Tracy (Tracy Morgan) and Jenna (Jane Krakowski). With special guest stars Edie Falco and James Carville.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep1
programme.desc: 30 Rock - Pilot - Head writer Liz Lemon finds herself defending her live TV show when brash new network executive Jack Donaghy (Alec Baldwin) starts meddling.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep2
programme.desc: The Aftermath - One erratic star (Tracy Morgan), one neurotic star (Jane Krakowski), and a meddlesome boss (Alec Baldwin) create panic in the writers room.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep3
programme.desc: Blind Date - Jack plays matchmaker, setting Liz up on a blind date.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep4
programme.desc: Jack The Writer - Liz keeps aspiring writer Jack from taking over the writers room and Kenneth the Page tries desperately to impress Tracy.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep5
programme.desc: Jack-Tor - Jack (Alec Baldwin) aspires to act and Tracy (Tracy Morgan) reveals a painful secret.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep6
programme.desc: Jack Meets Dennis - Liz Lemon goes back to her ex-boyfriend Dennis, (guest star Dean Winters) simply because she's bored.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep7
programme.desc: Tracy Does Conan - Two stars arguing over a coveted appearance on "Late Night with Conan O'Brien" (guest star Conan O'Brien) push Liz Lemon to the edge.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep8
programme.desc: The Break-Up - Liz finally calls it quits with Dennis (guest star Dean Winters) while personal politics pit Toofer against Tracy.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep9
programme.desc: The Baby Show - Liz (Tina Fey) and Jack (Alec Baldwin) both battle maternal woes. Chris Parnell guest stars.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep10
programme.desc: The Rural Juror - Jenna awaits the opening of her long-anticipated movie while Tracy digs out of debt.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep11
programme.desc: The Head and The Hair - Liz falls for an attractive guy and Jack walks in Kenneth's shoes.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep12
programme.desc: Black Tie - Tracy tempts Pete while Liz gets a glimpse into Jack's past.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep13
programme.desc: Up All Night - Valentine's Day goes awry for TGS cast. After the entire cast binges on some questionable seafood at the craft services table, they hunker down to pull an all nighter -- on Valentine's Day -- and cobble a new show together.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep14
programme.desc: The "C" Word - Liz works overtime to prove to her writers that she's a good boss in "30 Rock".

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep15
programme.desc: Hard Ball - Jack negotiates Josh's contract while Kenneth the Page earns a spot in Tracy's entourage.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep16
programme.desc: The Source Awards - Jack forces Tracy to attend The Source Awards, while Kenneth the Page catches the eye of a hip-hop star's girlfriend -- with special guest stars LL Cool J, Wayne Brady and Ghostface Killah.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep17
programme.desc: The Fighting Irish - Jack welcomes his brother Eddie (Special Guest Star Nathan Lane) into the 'TGS' family.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep18
programme.desc: Fireworks - Jack (Alec Baldwin) turns to Kenneth (Jack McBrayer) for help when an aggressive West Coast NBC exec (Special Guest Star Will Arnett) declares he's after Donaghy's job.

programme.title: Healthy Back To Work Ep1
programme.desc: Actualize CrossFit - Here at Actualize CrossFit, we believe that everyone deserves the right to fitness, regardless of age or ability.

programme.title: Healthy Back To Work Ep2
programme.desc: Drunk Skunk - A young, hip & trendy, family-fun bar & bistro that offers healthier meal options and provide a wide range of food selection.

programme.title: Healthy Back To Work Ep3
programme.desc: Ministry Of Fitness - Ministry Of Fitnetss delivers innovative and functional training programs, adaptable for all ages and abilities.

programme.title: Drum
programme.desc: A hot-shot journalist is swept up in a movement to challenge Apartheid in 1950s South Africa.

programme.title: One Last Thing
programme.desc: Dylan Derringer, a lonely dentist in Florida, is confronted by a figure from the past bringing news that sends him on an eventful and ultimately life-altering journey of discovery.

programme.title: The Net
programme.desc: A computer analyst's identity is stolen after a mysterious top-secret diskette comes into her possession.

programme.title: Right At Your Door
programme.desc: With Los Angeles under sieges by toxic bombs, Brad and Lexi struggle to survive with little supply, limited time and no information.

programme.title: The Contractor
programme.desc: James Dial, once a top CIA assassin and now retired, is called back by the CIA to kill a terrorist leader in London. But Dial learns that once his mission is accomplished, he will be next on the hit list, to remove any traces of American involvement.

programme.title: One Point O
programme.desc: After receiving mysterious empty packages inside his apartment, a young computer-programmer begins a personal investigation into their origins.

programme.title: A Single Shot
programme.desc: A single shot, aimed at a lone deer, hits and kills a young woman. Hunter John Moon watches the young woman die before discovering a box of money near her body. In a desperate panic, he takes the cash and attempts to cover up the killing.

programme.title: A Dark Truth
programme.desc: An ex-CIA op-turned-political talk show host is hired by a corporate whistleblower to expose her company’s cover-up of a massacre in a South American village.

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: A former marine and his cash-strapped brother prepare to go head to head in a mixed martial arts battle in order to win the biggest prize ever handed out in the sport. Will the fight force them to finally confront their past, or push them further apart?

programme.title: Meeting Evil
programme.desc: Follows disillusioned young family man John as a mysterious stranger, Richie takes him on a murder-fueled ride that transforms the weak-willed John into a desperate hero willing to go to any length to protect his family.

programme.title: John Grisham's The Rainmaker
programme.desc: An idealistic young lawyer, taking on the case of an indigent family whose son is denied medical care by a powerful insurance company and dies, uncovers a multi-billion dollar insurance scam.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York
programme.desc: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A successful sports agent, fired for being honorable, fights for his ideals and those who depend on him.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild: Meet the Family
programme.desc: One family, 37 very different faces: this definitive portrait of an incredible animal group will change the way we look at wild dogs forever. The wild dog family is the most successful carnivore on the planet. This revelatory documentary explores the reasons for their success and meets some stunning and surprising members of the dog dynasty. From the biggest and fastest, to the most elusive and smartest, witness the unbelievable behaviour of dogs in the wild - including species that climb trees and communicate through sneezing. Discover how canines thrive in some of earth's most inhospitable places and learn how intelligence, communication and family bonds are key to their survival.

programme.title: Inside Our Autistic Minds (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: - In this episode we see how an autistic comedian is helped to reveal to her mum what's really going on inside her head, and gives a non-speaking autistic man the chance to take his message to the world.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: See how Britain's National Gallery, The Tate, stepped in to help the Bankside on the southern shore of the River Thames.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild: Meet the Family
programme.desc: One family, 37 very different faces: this definitive portrait of an incredible animal group will change the way we look at wild dogs forever. The wild dog family is the most successful carnivore on the planet. This revelatory documentary explores the reasons for their success and meets some stunning and surprising members of the dog dynasty. From the biggest and fastest, to the most elusive and smartest, witness the unbelievable behaviour of dogs in the wild - including species that climb trees and communicate through sneezing. Discover how canines thrive in some of earth's most inhospitable places and learn how intelligence, communication and family bonds are key to their survival.

programme.title: Life Below Zero (S10) Ep7
programme.desc: Burdens of Winter - As the Arctic summer turns to fall and temperatures begin their decline, Alaskan ingenuity assists in securing materials for the coming freeze. To prepare for the winter ahead, bush-dwellers brave dangerous encounters with hungry predators.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Masked Bandits Ep6
programme.desc: Capture teams from Kenya head to Somali border to capture 50 rare and endangered antelope called a hirola. The hirola numbers have been plummeting over the last decade, and conservation groups know that by capturing and placing them into a protected predator-free conservancy they will rebound.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Australian Spring Fever Ep6
programme.desc: Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spiky and Stinky Ep3
programme.desc: Check out vet Phil’s clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinic’s favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew who’s the catch of the day.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle Ep4
programme.desc: Join the team’s scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey who’s having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbill’s new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Mini Giants Ep1
programme.desc: Elephants, gorillas, rhinos, and bison are among the largest and most imposing land-dwelling mammals, but they all start out as helpless infants. See how babies from each species find their way to becoming giants.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - A Mother's Tale Ep1
programme.desc: The jungle of Sri Lanka is a monkey’s paradise. But not everyone here is equal. Anna sits at the bottom of the social ladder. And with a newborn baby, life is getting tougher. As drought grips the region tensions boil over. Anna is a devoted mother. But can she do enough to keep her son alive?

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 - Fraser Island Ep4
programme.desc: Just to the south of the Great Barrier Reef and the Tropic of Capricorn, Fraser Island lies like a sprawling lizard. Some 120 kilometers long and up to 25 kilometers wide, Fraser Island is now the largest sand island on Earth. Somehow on this nutrient-poor bed of sand life has thrived. Dingoes patrol its forests in search of wallabies while white-bellied sea eagles scour the beaches from above. From the lakes to the forests and its crystal clear streams - Fraser Island is a unique mosaic of unlikely habitats that have earned it World Heritage Status.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - A Place in the Wild Ep5
programme.desc: Kenya takes a major step with the opening of its first community-run rhino sanctuary in the heart of Samburu territory. The threat to Kenya’s rhinos from armed, illegal poaching gangs is the highest it's been in 40 years, which makes the sanctuary vital.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Masked Bandits Ep6
programme.desc: Capture teams from Kenya head to Somali border to capture 50 rare and endangered antelope called a hirola. programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Mother's Darlings Ep2
programme.desc: Not all infants in the animal kingdom get to have a good mother. But these are the stories of the lucky ones, from a ring-tailed lemur who learns everything from its mom to a tiny orangutan that receives a constant supply of motherly cuddles.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - A Place in the Wild Ep5

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The More the Merrier - Watch fur seals give birth by the thousands, black bear cubs wrestle with their buddies, and meerkat pups forge bonds by sharing chores—all proving that growing up in the animal kingdom is easier when you have numbers on your side.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fresh Meat - Infancy isn’t all fun and games. Some animals must hit the ground running to avoid becoming dinner for predators. Take an in-depth look at what life is like for newborn animals that must learn fast your die young.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Body Language - Join researchers as they study how animals communicate. Find out how wolves use their body language to unite the pack and maintain a sophisticated social structure, and see the astounding number of gestures chimps use to communicate.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rumble in the Jungle - Tune into the natural world and explore frequencies beyond human hearing, like the gentle hum of giraffes in the evening, or creatures who use song to claim territory on a seemingly silent coral reef.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible Signals - Could undiscovered animal languages save some of our most endangered species? From subtle scents to colors that are invisible to the human eye, uncover the hidden ways creatures communicate, which scientists are only starting to understand.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Borderlands - Where the mountains cross international borders, herds of elk and moose live side by side with predators like bears and wolves. The predator/prey relationship is a delicate balance, and the perfect place to see it in action is the Kootenay area of the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Born to Be Different - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a duck that won’t go in the water without a ride from her pooch pal, an elephant that thinks she’s a buffalo, and a herd of cows that adopt an orphaned deer.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Frida the Jaguar Cub - Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs - Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun - Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: A Bee's Diary
programme.desc: A Bee's Diary - In a beehive, tens of thousands of tiny animals work toward a common goal: the survival of the colony. But what is life like for an individual honeybee? A Bee’s Diary tells that story.

programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Florida - Florida is famous for its sandy shores—and there’s plenty to go around. Florida has the most tidal shoreline of any state in the continental USA. These ocean-side playgrounds are also critical habitats for threatened and endangered species.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fresh Meat - Infancy isn’t all fun and games. Some animals must hit the ground running to avoid becoming dinner for predators. Take an in-depth look at what life is like for newborn animals that must learn fast your die young.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep8

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Lil' Hunters - Life at the upper end of the food chain means hard work and constant learning. Discover how young predators, from lion and cheetah cubs to coyotes and silver fox kits, learn to move stealthily and harness their highly adapted skills.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Family Ties - The animal kingdom can be cold and unforgiving, but for baby baboons, penguins, capybaras, and emperor tamarins, having a helpful family makes life a little easier.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 Ep2
programme.desc: In the Peaks - The air is thin and cold, trees can’t even live here -­‐ it’s not exactly a welcoming place to live. But animals like mountain goats and bighorn sheep and even black bears manage to skitter around these peaks with ease. We’ll take a look at how these creatures manage to defy gravity, among some of the highest peaks on the continent.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Waterways - Some of mightiest rivers in North America originate on the glacial heights of the Rocky Mountains. The lakes, rivers and marshes of the Rockies are like arteries pulsing through the landscape, feeding the creatures that call the mountains home. Fed by glaciers and motivated by gravity, these waterways are split by the massive Rockies, which divert flow into the Atlantic, Pacific, and Arctic Oceans. From the uninhabitable icy pecks, water melts off glaciers, runs down thunderous waterfalls, filters through wetlands, sculpts the terrain, and finally flows out to the ocean, sustaining life and transforming environments along the way.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Balancing the Forest - Survival in the forest means maintaining a delicate balance between growth and destruction and death and rebirth - a forest should be in a constant state of regeneration. When trees get too tall they block all the sunlight from hitting the ground, which means grasses and smaller shrubs can’t grow, diminishing habitat for animals like elk, moose, caribou, and wolves.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Group Survival - For a great many species, the structures of group living are the most important for survival. Although social living is integral to many of the animals that call the Rocky Mountains home, no two species organize their society in the same way. Even among closely related species there can be drastic differences in social structure; communication, hierarchy, mating, and diet are all inextricably informed by specific environmental and genetic adaptations for group survival.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Friend in Need - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends including Charlotte, a schnauzer who enjoys bath time with her guinea pig pal Wallace, and a randy ram called Hamish who likes to sneak off to live with a herd of dairy cows instead of his own kind.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Domino Effect - Witness some big changes when four cute new arrivals join the nursery classes. And for a handful of adolescent males that are growing too big and boisterous for their babysitters, it’s their last day at forest school.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Dilla’s Surprise - Crash a fruit-flinging party celebrating the return of Jelapat, Talaken, Bawan, and Rona to the nursery to join the rest of their classmates. Meanwhile, flooding overtakes the pre-release islands, and injuries stifle the progress of two students.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Kesi Turns a Corner - Watch a milestone moment when two students get their first forest time in years. And another pair of students are confined to the school’s clinic after an accident in the forest leaves Beni with a broken leg and Lala with a broken elbow.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Bears on the Move - Beni and Lala are going stir crazy in the sick bay, but they must recover before returning to the rough and tumble of class. And at forest school, a termite-foraging lesson inspires class clown Valentino to make a finger-licking discovery.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Wine’s New Friend - Join two seriously ill orangutans in the medical clinic, where Erik’s head infection is causing concern and fourteen-year-old Mia’s life depends on a blood transfusion. Outside the clinic, the infants find a secret treat hidden inside a rubber tree.

programme.desc: The Brando, French Polynesia - Giles and Monica fly to the other side of the world to work in one of the world's most luxurious eco resorts on the small island of Tetiaroa in French Polynesia, not too far from Monica's birthplace - Samoa.

programme.desc: Two single mums in Manchester need Gregg and Chris' help! Working together to feed both families after school is tricky with everyone's different tastes, so can the boys find them tasty meals they can all enjoy together?

programme.title: Donal's Irish Adventure (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Donal and Max set off for the midlands in this installment, to Ireland's hidden heartlands on the banks of the river Shannon.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off (S12) Ep6
programme.desc: Pastry Week - It's Pastry Week and the bakers tackle choux pastry doughnuts and a tricky Turkish technical, before creating a savoury, delicately designed showstopping pastry pie packed full of flavour.

programme.desc: It's the semi-final, and the four remaining teams face a secret recipe challenge before making a magical Charlotte Russe display and some gourmet theatre, as they compete for a place in the final.

programme.desc: Gregg and Chris are in Bromley reuniting a family with their kitchen. Bored of Dad James' cooking, the Winbournes often eat out but they all need to play their part, cooking from scratch and saving cash for the future.

programme.desc: Who doesn't love a good fried, spicy chicken sandwich? This crispy chicken is the ultimate comfort food!
